name: Arugula Pesto

ingredients.name: oz/60 g freshly grated parmesan cheese
8 fl oz 250 ml extra-virgin olive oil

instructions: 1. In a food processor, combine the walnuts, garlic, arugula, Parmesan, and 1 tsp salt and pulse to blend. With the machine running, pour in the olive oil through the food tube in a slow, steady stream and process until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl as needed. Taste and adjust the seasonings.
